channel.title: Plant Development on COTTON
channel.description: Recent content in Plant Development on COTTON

item.title: GaJAZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cotton_A_11862 Gene Symbol: GaJAZ1 Gene Name: Genome: Gossypium hirsutum L.

item.title: GbWRKY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GbWRKY1 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium barbadense Functional Descriptions: Our data suggest that GbWRKY1 is a critical regulator mediating the plant defense-to-development transition during V.

item.title: GhARF17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_A06G004210 Gene Symbol: GhARF17 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhARF18
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_A05G042500 Gene Symbol: GhARF18 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhBRC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhBRC1 Gene Name: BRANCHED 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhBRC1 has the same function as Arabidopsis BRC1 in repressing axillary bud development.

item.title: GhBZR3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A10G0312 Gene Symbol: GhBZR3 Gene Name: Genome: genome version is NBI v1.

item.title: GhCUC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhCUC2 Gene Name: CUP-SHAPED COTYLEDON2 Genome: reference genome TM-1 (AD1) genome NAU-NBI Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The miR164-GhCUC2-GhBRC1 module regulates plant architecture through abscisic acid in cotton.

item.title: GhDREB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhDREB1 Gene Name: DREB-like transcription factor Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhDREB1 increases plant tolerance to low temperature and is negatively regulated by gibberellic acid.

item.title: GhFAD2–3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A11G2814 Gene Symbol: GhFAD2–3 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhFAD2–3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D11G3169 Gene Symbol: GhFAD2–3 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhGalT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CotAD_62126 Gene Symbol: GhGalT1 Gene Name: β-galactosyltransferase 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: A gene (GhGalT1) encoding a putative β-1,3-galactosyltransferase (GalT) was identified in cotton.

item.title: GhGLR4.8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D03G0209 Gene Symbol: GhGLR4.8 Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhPAS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D12G0607 Gene Symbol: GhPAS1 Gene Name: PAGODA1 SUPPRESSOR 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The bHLH transcription factor GhPAS1 mediates BR signaling to regulate plant development and architecture in cotton.

item.title: GhTINY2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GhD06G0642 Gene Symbol: GhTINY2 Gene Name: Genome: Cotton Functional Genomics Database Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Orchestration of plant development and defense by indirect crosstalk of salicylic acid and brassinosteorid signaling via transcription factor GhTINY2.

item.title: GhUBC2L
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D08G2323 Gene Symbol: GhUBC2L Gene Name: Genome: G.
